artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Daikokuya Heikichi; Carver: Yokogawa Takejirō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: left sheet of a triptych; standing figure wringing a blue cloth; blue and white kimono with floral pattern; marble-like screens in background; L2001.372.194-249 received bound into a book
markings: combined date and censor seal: 酉四改 {tori yon aratame} (Cock 4 inspected); publisher\'s seal: 本　両國　大平板 {Hon, Ryōgoku, Daihei han}; carver\'s seal: 彫竹 {hori Take}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: in toshidama cartouche: 豊國画 {Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Mondo zakura enishi no Shiraito 主水桜実録白糸, performed at the Nakamura Theater, 1861, 4th lunar month.
title: Actor Kataoka Nizaemon VIII as Suzuki Mondo
